title: Cultist
contents: subtitle | Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good
property | Languages | any one language (usually Common)
description | Dark Devotion | The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened .
description | Scimitar | Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
